response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to both of us, and I believe it would significantly enhance your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exceptional chance to secure a piece that is worth $1,500,000, allowing you to save a substantial amount while gaining access to unparalleled quality and prestige. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
